name: Have At You! (CANCELED DEMO)
description:
This was only a demo for the project, but it is today canceled! "Have At You!" is a work in progress arcade-styled beat em up/brawler set in a fantasy universe. Combine swordfight and spellcasting too eradicate your foes!

Each "level" have a slayer count and that indicates when a level is completed and when you can move on!
Each character have it's own traits and abilities. The abilities can be used by spending "Power" which is gained by slaying foes! The more power you have, the better your abilities are.

The game will also feature a co-op mode and a versus mode, where players can fight eachother!
There is a demo out right now, containing the mode "Solo Brawler" which demonstrate the beat em up features.

The controls are seen in the character selection screen, but here they are again:

  • W,A,S,D - Movement
  • G - Primary attack
  • H - Ability one
